input_text.Prompt:
Given a product name and product features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product name:
NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat

Product features:
9-ounce, 100 % nylon face
Recycled vinyl backing for a durable and longer-lasting product
Machine-made and tufted in the USA
Non-skid backing with taped borders for added durability
Machine washable; vacuum regularly and spot clean for any easy and quick clean

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Show your team spirt and add some fun to your next tailgate with the NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat! This officially licensed mat is made from 9-ounce, 100 % nylon face with recycled vinyl backing, providing a durable and longer-lasting product. The non-skid backing with taped borders ensures that the mat will stay in place, even during the most intense games. Measuring at 60" L x 42" W, this machine-made and tufted in the USA mat is perfect for any game day gathering. It's easy to keep clean, simply machine wash and vacuum regularly and spot clean for a quick clean. Show your team pride and add the NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat to your tailgating essentials.
input_text.Response B: Want a unique way to support your favorite team? Try the NCAA Unisex-Adult Football Mat! This machine-made and tufted in the USA mat features a 9-ounce, 100% nylon face with a non-skid backing and taped borders for added durability. The recycled vinyl backing helps make this mat more durable and longer-lasting. It's easy to keep clean; just vacuum regularly and spot clean. Perfect for any fan, this mat lets you show your team spirit in a fun and functional way.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
